Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that's 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., :, /, =, +, @, -, and ".
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that's 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., :, /, =, +, @, -, and ".

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that's 1 to 256 characters in length. You can use any of the following characters: Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that's 1 to 256 characters in length. You can use any of the following characters: Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

DisplayName.description: The name of the ODB peering connection.
DisplayName.markdownDescription:
The name of the ODB peering connection.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z_](?!.*--)[a-zA-Z0-9_-]*$  
Update requires: Replacement

OdbPeeringConnectionArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the ODB peering connection.
OdbPeeringConnectionArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the ODB peering connection.

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

OdbPeeringConnectionId.markdownDescription:
The unique identifier of the ODB peering connection.

OdbNetworkId.description: The unique identifier of the ODB network.
OdbNetworkId.markdownDescription:
The unique identifier of the ODB network.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 6  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^(arn:(?:aws|aws-cn|aws-us-gov|aws-iso-{0,1}[a-z]{0,1}):[a-z0-9-]+:[a-z0-9-]*:[0-9]+:[a-z0-9-]+/[a-zA-Z0-9_~.-]{6,64}|[a-zA-Z0-9_~.-]{6,64})$  
Update requires: Replacement
